GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.10.127
GSD.description:
virtio_net: fix xdp_rxq_info bug after suspend/resume

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.127 by commit 340fbdc8011f2dc678f622c5ce1cbb5ab8305de7, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 754b8a21a96d5f11712245aef907149606b323ae. For more details please see the references link.
